name: Ekis
description:
Welcome to EKIS, the mental skill game that gives you a different challenge every day.

In this fun game you must darken all the squares of the board. Tap on a square to change its color. The row, column or diagonal indicated by the square you tap will also change color.

With EKIS you can:

  • Play a new challenge every day.
  • Access the previous daily challenges to improve your scores.
  • Share your scores on social networks.

This game is free for 4X4 square boards and you will have access only to the challenges of the current month.

By making a single small payment you will have access to:

  • 3X3, 5X5 and 6X6 boards.
  • Possibility to change the colors of the game.
  • Access to all boards from January 1, 2022.

Challenge yourself with a daily puzzle and try to improve your records. Play alone, with friends or with your family and find out who gets the most records by sharing your results on your social networks.

EKIS is the new NestorGames puzzle implemented by Garaje Imagina that continues the series of games that test your ability to solve the most interesting and fun mental challenges.

Dare to play with EKIS.
